introduction: In 1945 the world was celebrating the end of the war, and millions of soldiers were returning home. But Manchuria was still occupied by the Japanese fascist forces. In accordance with the Union treaty the Soviet troops were sent to fight the furious enemy out. On the 18th of August, a unit of Soviet strike fighters under the command of Ivan Zabelin were sent on an unprecedentedly bold mission to battle in the very heart of the enemy.
